name: UCircularThrobber
doc:
A throbber widget that orients images in a spinning circle.

* No Children
* Spinner Progress

Period: The amount of time for a full circle (in seconds)
Radius: The radius of the circle. If the throbber is a child of Canvas Panel, the 'Size to Content' option must be enabled in order to set Radius.

methods.name: SetNumberOfPieces
methods.doc: Sets how many pieces there are.

methods.name: SetPeriod
methods.doc: Sets the amount of time for a full circle (in seconds).

methods.name: SetRadius
methods.doc: Sets the radius of the circle.
